comment: I said this to a colleague at the department that he is not entirely wrong but needs to define at least two variables to make a strong case@TheRealAckom
@TheRealAckom Ghana is not the only country benefiting from it, we seem to be fairly ahead of our contingents in Africa. Had it not been this virus frustrating the stock market........
